ygData.subject: Re: KS tricks + Grouping for XP
ygData.msgSnippet: ... You re one fucking idiot, aren t you? The server that guy talked about is the PvP server, moron. You try to KS there, they just kill you and there s no
ygData.messageBody:
yur@... wrote:

> From: yur@...
>
> Why does everyone keep telling me "come to server blah blah and see how
> your tricks works" . I am on Tunare server and i'm gona stay here and KS as
> long as i think its giving me more XP than doing something else. Anyways, ppl
> on every server are just humans, some are stupid, some are smart. Some ppl
> can't do dick all about me KS their kills and some will take action. So it
> doesn't depend on which server you play on, you can always KS. On Tunare, not a
> lot of KSer out there, i've only met 2 others who also KS on a regular basis, so
> its pretty rare too. The more rare it is, the better actually, cuz most ppl
> don't know how to deal with it instead of just crying how i'm taking all the xp
> and challenge me to duals hahaha.
>

You're one fucking idiot, aren't you?

The server that guy talked about is the PvP server, moron. You try to KS there, they
just kill you and there's no problem.

Got it?

--
Sergey
--
KPS PUNK (Paramilitary Undercover Nuclear Kamikaze)
